content: Can we get a channel for the Rustonomicon?
@isHavvy What should the stream name be? Most streams have the team/group name (like t-compiler/const-eval), but I'm not sure that applies here.
Well, there's a t-lang/wg-reference. If you want a separate channel from the reference, I'd say t-lang/rustonomicon. Or we could put both in t-lang/doc.
/me likes the idea of putting both in t-lang/doc so that there's topic cross-pollination.
I'd be in favor of just t-lang/doc
perhaps we should rename the reference stream? not sure if that'll break links somewhere

Renaming as t-lang/doc sounds fine to me. I mentioned during the opening keynote that Rustonomicon needs maintainers and a few people seemed interested, but they asked for a place to chat and I didn't have an answer.
If renaming breaks links, we can just close the reference channel. There's only one active thread in it.
I'm just going to rename, seems better all around

simulacrum said:

perhaps we should rename the reference stream? not sure if that'll break links somewhere

Renaming a stream won't break links; there's a stream ID in the URL.
